1.「ありがとう ありがとう デスマスターさん。| これで ようやく 天に昇れます…: Thank you. Thank you, Death Master. Now I can|finally ascend to the heavens...shhhh.

3.「えへへ～ 仕事してる デスマスターを| 見てみたくて 追いかけてきちゃった。: Ehehe~ I had to catch up to see Death Master|at work.

4.「あ～ でも ひと足 遅かったみたい？| お弔いは すんじゃったようだけど| ア: Ah~ But I guess I was a little late? I guess|I've already done my mourning, but maybe I'll|do some prayers too.

5.「見ず知らずの ぼくなんかのために| ありがとうございます……しくしく。: Thank you very much for your help to me, a|total stranger............................

6.「こちらが 見えてないようなので| 直接 お礼を言えなくて 心苦しい……。| こ:
I am sorry that I can't thank you in person|since you can't seem to see me... Please|forgive me for being so rude as to ascend to|
|heaven.

7.「幽霊さん アタシにも感謝してくれたの！？| 霊界通話機の声は 聞こえたんだけど: Ghost, did you thank me too? I could hear your|voice on the spirit world caller, but I guess|I can't hear your real voice.

8.「でも くじけない！ アタシのご先祖サマは| デスマスターなんだもん。アタシの霊: But I am not crushed! My ancestors are death|masters. My psychic powers must still be|sleeping!

9.「えっ！？ どしたの！| なんか出てきた？ ひょっとして 幽霊？: What? What happened? Did something come|out? Is it a ghost, by any chance?

12.「……変なオバケが アタシに向かって 継承者？: ...a strange apparition towards me, an heir?

13.「継承 継承……遺産の継承とか？| じつは アタシには 本当の両親がいて| とて: Inheritance, inheritance, inheritance? I have|real parents, and they're going to leave me a|huge inheritance!

15.「考えても しゃあないし| デズ師匠んちに 帰ろっか。: I can't help thinking about it, so let's go|back to Master Dez's house.

16.「ハズレ！ ハズレ！| 継承者ニ アラズ。継承者ニ アラズ。: Hazure! Hazret! Successor ni Araz. The heirs|ni araz.
